snippet: The automaker will add tow hitches on some Liberty S.U.V.’s and Grand Cherokees in an effort to lower danger from fire in rear-impact collisions.
abstract: National Safety Highway Traffic Safety Administration says Chrysler can proceed with unusual recall plan affecting 1.6 million Jeeps; automaker will add towing hitches on some models of Liberty SUV’s and Grand Cherokees in effort to lower danger from fire in rear-impact collisions.
lead_paragraph: The automaker will add tow hitches on some Liberty S.U.V.’s and Grand Cherokees in an effort to lower danger from fire in rear-impact collisions.

headline.main: Unusual Chrysler Fix for Jeep Fires Wins Approval
headline.print_headline: Unusual Chrysler Fix for Jeep Fires Wins Approval

keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
keywords.name: subject
